title: #60: Terrorism: Built In America
description:
Somewhere along the way, America discovered that the best way to take control of their citizens was to scare them to death and manipulate them through fear. It worked.

These days the average American lives their lives with the belief that a terrorist attack is liable to happen just about anywhere because Islamic terrorists hate them for their freedoms.

It is partially true that “they” hate them because of their freedoms, but the “they” is actually the American government, and the government is actively trying to remove those very freedoms under the guise of protecting the public from “terrorists”.
